name: Bostech
overview: Bostech Corporation provides performance improvement solutions powered by ChainBuilder. Bostech’s solutions increase productivity and profits for companies in the healthcare, energy, retail, manufacturing and distribution markets by delivering secure, on-demand, browser-based workflows and real-time analytics that seamlessly connect to underlying business systems. For the healthcare industry, Bostech provides a solution called ChainBuilder Labs that dramatically boosts productivity for labs and healthcare providers. ChainBuilder Labs is deployed quickly over the cloud delivering automated, auditable, secure processes that are key to achieving meaningful use of electronic health records (EHR).
